name: Rome
headline: The marketplace for truckers
description: Rome is building a freight marketplace for truck drivers to find work, receive payments, and manage their business. Today, Rome helps 80+ drivers earn up to 40% more by accessing 10x more loads through scraping brokers/shippers. We’re looking to become the platform for all truck drivers and eventually own the layer between drivers and shippers.

founders.name: Craig Weiss, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO of Rome. Craig was an early engineer at Scale AI (engineer #20). While at Scale, Craig was a founding member on the Sensor Fusion team and was a key player in securing multi-million dollar contracts with Scale’s largest autonomous vehicle customers. His past experience includes engineering at Google, Facebook, Snapchat, Lyft and NASA.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Rome**

Founded in 2022 and based in San Francisco, Rome is quickly establishing itself as a pivotal player in the logistics space, specifically targeting truck drivers. The company emerged from Y Combinator's W22 batch, reflecting its innovative approach to freight management. 

**Mission: The Marketplace for Truckers**

Rome's mission is clear: to create a comprehensive marketplace that connects truck drivers with available loads, streamlines payment processes, and simplifies business management. By leveraging advanced scraping techniques, Rome helps over 80 drivers discover ten times more loads, enabling them to earn up to 40% more compared to traditional methods. The ultimate goal? To be the go-to platform for all truck drivers and seize the intermediary space between drivers and shippers.

**Current Status and Offerings**

With a lean team of just one employee and a strong backing from its Group Partner, Nan, Rome is efficiently driving innovation in the truck freight sector. They emphasize user empowerment, with their platform allowing drivers to book loads for free. 

Their tagline, "All Loads Lead to Rome," encapsulates the value they bring to truckers—finding the highest RPM (revenue per mile) loads across the internet. It's a straightforward promise: help drivers maximize their earnings through faster, more efficient access to available work.

**How to Get Involved**

If you're a truck driver looking to enhance your earnings, you can explore Rome’s offerings and download their app through [their website](https://rome.ai) or directly from the Apple App Store and Google Play.

---

In the ever-evolving landscape of logistics, Rome is positioning itself as a transformative force for truck drivers, equipped to innovate and streamline an industry that’s ripe for disruption. Keep an eye on them—they're on a path to redefine how freight works.
